javadoc: Command to append a specific type of comment on a code unit.

methods.name: <init>

params.name: addr
params.comment: address of code unit where comment will be placed

params.name: commentType
params.comment:
valid comment type (see CodeUnit#EOL_COMMENT, 
 CodeUnit#PLATE_COMMENT, etc)

params.name: comment
params.comment: comment for code unit, should not be null

params.name: separator
params.comment:
characters to separate the new comment from the previous comment when
 concatenating.

name: AppendCommentCmd
comment: Command to append a specific type of comment on a code unit.
